message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value and my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $750000 is still a bit below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $850000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations so far.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $850000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $775000. I'm confident that's a fair price for the product, and I'm eager to make a deal.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go below $825000. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations so far. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, so I'll offer you the product for $825000. It's a final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to make one more offer. I'll meet you at $795000. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $820000. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, so I'll offer you the product for $820000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, to be honest. I've been trying to negotiate a fair price, but it feels like we're not getting anywhere. I'm willing to make one last offer, but I need to be closer to my budget. I'll offer $785000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to walk away and consider buying from John.
